description: > **Note:** This SPI is currently in beta and is subject to change. Some SPIs are currently not available to all users.

The Shipping Rates SPI provides functionality for connecting your site to shipping rates providers not currently supported by Wix. You can also implement custom shipping rates and options using code. These rates are displayed on your store's Cart and Checkout pages.
Wix eCommerce calls the SPI endpoint [`getShippingRates()`](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/spis/ecom-shipping-rates/getshippingrates) to retrieve the relevant shipping rates.
Learn more about the [Shipping Rates custom extension](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-tutorial-shipping-rates-custom-extension-beta).

params.name: options
params.doc: Shipping origin, shipping destination, and general configurations.

docs.summary: Retrieves shipping rates provided by a custom shipping rates extension.
description: This function is automatically called by Wix eCommerce to retrieve the shipping rates provided by your extension.
This happens when actions are performed on the cart/checkout entities/pages and/or when there is a change to any property in the `options` parameter. For example, when an item is added to the cart.

+ The `options` parameter is passed to `getShippingRates()` when the function is called. However, you may add to the data provided in `options` if, for example, you want to integrate with a shipping provider that requires more information.

+ Every time `getShippingRates()` is called, the response is cached. This cache is valid for 10 minutes and is used until a change is made to any property in the `options` parameter, at which point the cache is refreshed.

+ If your extension fails to respond within 10 seconds, the call will purposefully fail to ensure a smooth user experience. We recommend optimizing your logic: calls to external APIs take longer and are outside our control; use fewer wixData actions when possible.

examples.title: Example of a `shippingRates` return value
body: "details": "Handling fee of $5 applied for fragile items."

examples.title: Return shipping rates based on quantity of items in a cart
body: // Tally the quantity of all items
// Return shipping rates based on the calculated items' quantity
// Currency value is taken from provided options object
// If cartQuantity is less than 3, the following shipping rate is returned

examples.title: Example of [`spi-integration-config.js`](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-tutorial-shipping-rates-custom-extension-beta#my-extension-name-configjs) file
body: "description": "Providing shipping options for the US east-coast"

members.name: type
members.doc:
Additional charge type.
Supported values:
 - `"HANDLING_FEE"`

members.name: details
members.doc: Details of the additional charge. For example, `'Handling fee of $5 applied for gift wrapping.'`

members.name: price
members.doc: Cost of additional charge.

members.name: addressLine1
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address information, such as apartment, suite, or floor.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with street number and name in separate properties.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision, such as state, prefecture, or province, in [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2) format.

members.name: country
members.doc: 2-letter country code in [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Postal or zip code.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Buyer's first name.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Buyer's last name.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Buyer's phone number.

members.name: company
members.doc: Company name.

members.name: vatId
members.doc: Tax information (for Brazil only). If `vatId.id` is provided, `vatId.type` must also be set.

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item in its Wix or 3rd-party catalog. For example, `productId` for Wix Stores or `eventId` for Wix Events.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the catalog app. For example, the Wix Stores `appId`, or the 3rd-party `appId`.

members.name: options
members.doc: Additional info in key:value pair form. For example, `{"options":{"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}}` or `{"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}`.

members.name: price
members.doc: The shipping rate's price. Must align with the [currency's decimal separator](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes).

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency of the shipping rate price as a 3-letter [ISO-4217 currency code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217). Must align with the `currency` passed to the function.

members.name: additionalCharges
members.doc: Additional costs such as a handling fee for packaging fragile items.

members.name: name
members.doc: Item name.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: The number of items ordered.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: Reference to the item's origin catalog.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item.

members.name: price
members.doc: Price of a single item after discounts.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscount
members.doc: Price of a single item before discounts.

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Total line item price after discounts. This is equal to `price` multiplied by `quantity`.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeDiscount
members.doc: Total line item price before discounts.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time as free text. For example, `'3-5 business days'`.

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Shipping instructions. For example, for pickup: "Please arrive during opening hours".

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Additional details for a pickup.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: The line items to be shipped.

members.name: shippingDestination
members.doc: Address to ship to.

members.name: shippingOrigin
members.doc: Address to ship from.

members.name: buyerContactDetails
members.doc: Buyer's contact details.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit used for all items in the shipment. Supported values: `"KG"` (kilograms) or `"LB"` (pounds).

members.name: taxIncludedInPrices
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the items' prices.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Item weight. Measurement unit (KG or LB) is taken from `weightUnit` property.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Stock keeping unit. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this item is shippable.

members.name: addressLine1
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address information, such as apartment, suite, or floor.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision, such as state, prefecture, or province, in [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2) format.

members.name: country
members.doc: 2-letter country code in an [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Postal or zip code.

members.name: address
members.doc: Pickup address.

members.name: pickupMethod
members.doc:
Pickup method.
Supported values:
 - `"STORE_PICKUP"`
 - `"PICKUP_POINT"`

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code that acts as an ID for a shipping rate. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"`.

members.name: title
members.doc: Shipping rate title. For example, `'USPS Standard Overnight Delivery'`, `'Standard'`, or `'First-Class Package International'`.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Shipping logistics.

members.name: cost
members.doc: Shipping cost.

members.name: shippingRates
members.doc: Available shipping rates. These define the shipping rate options that are displayed to site visitors on the Cart and Checkout pages.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: id
members.doc: Buyer's tax ID.

members.name: type
members.doc:
VAT type.
Supported values:
 - `"CPF"`
 - `"CNPJ"`
